title: Price above equilibrium of $4 causes a surplus

content.prompt: In the market shown in the graph above, at a price of $5, there will be

choices.label: a surplus and the price will eventually fall
a surplus generating a decrease in demand
a shortage and the price will eventually rise
a shortage generating an increase in supply
an increase in supply and a decrease in demand

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
